phrases: Scars that just refuse to fade from memory
Sometimes the burdens too much for one to bear
Do Not give up on me, please do not turn me away
Ill hold your hand in mine
Will I lose my hold on her someday?
Or can I keep the fears at bay?
Echoing, distant voices wither into silence.
But there is one thing that will never ever age
my love for you is timeless
Do Not ever say such things to me
All happenings Find meaning in the story
In time the clouds will clear away,
so just stay, please stay with me Whoa!
Who are we to pass through you?
That answer will find you someday
Why do you have to keep fighting so?
My purpose is to save Rukia Kuchiki!
Was Not it just this spring that she went missing in the human world?
I would hardly think that is worth risking your life for.
Its true I know nothing about her
And that it may fall short of being worthy of risking my life.
However, Ichigo wants to save her!
I do not need any other reason to risk my life!
Well, if you are that determined,
then it would be insulting to ask you to go away.
I guess it cannot be helped.
Then, I guess Ill have to take your life!
What does the Ritei-tai want with me?
If they wish to give me orders, the Hell Butterfly should have sufficed.
Yes However, it is because this message is signed
by both Head Captain Yamamoto and Captain Hitsugaya of Squad Ten.
Is it a top priority order?
Is that all you can do, run?
There Is no way I cannot!
Ill let you take the first swing.
You can cut me up anywhere you want.
You can go for my neck, my gut, my eyeball
If you want, you can even kill me with this attack.
No way I know I swung down with all my might.
Why is it that there is not even a scratch on him?
Why is it that my hands split instead?
Do Not run around so much.
I do not like playing tag with weaklings.
But I could not cut him!
Does it mean there is such a great difference in power between us?
I Have got to calm down.
There Is no reason for me NOT to be able to cut him.
I Am just overwhelmed by his Spiritual Pressure.
If I calm down and sharpen my Spiritual Pressure
there is no reason I cannot cut him!
Even Old Man Zangetsu said it
Calm down calm down calm down...
Rid yourself of fear Look to the fore
It cannot be Chad has lost?
Who Would have thought his final attack would be this powerful?
If Id taken a direct hit,
it could have been really bad for me.
Its amazing for any human to even get into Seireitei,
but to think he could fight this hard
It is not like you to be out of breath.
one of the boys from Ritei-tai was here, was not he?
The because of death was removal of his Saketsu Chain and Hakusui,
It was not an accidental death.
signed by both Head Captain Yamamoto and Captain Hitsugaya,
so I do not believe there is any mistake.
Shall we go and see him?
This Ryoka is not dead, is he?
Shall I deliver the final blow?
Shall I deliver the final blow?
Girls should not do things like that.
the person who killed Captain Aizen was probably one of the Ryoka!
Anyway, there is no need to be in such a hurry to kill him.
Let Us call the rescue squad and have him put into a cell somewhere.
If there is the possibility that one of them is the killer,
all the more reason to keep him alive.
I will make the arrangements at once.
I apologize for trying to meddle.
Things seem to have gotten quite out of hand.
but his Spiritual Pressure is still there!
All the people who have lent me their strength
I have not got any time
Or, have you just given up?
I do not feel like dying yet.
everything on my shoulders will be destroyed.
Now I know I can fight him.
You can do it if you try!
Do Not let your guard down yet.
This is where the fun begins.
Sosuke Aizen, Captain of Squad Five, has passed away.
When he was lowered from the wall, he was no longer breathing.
Is there any possibility of a gigai?
I investigated every possibility, including the chance that
someone had used a gigai to deceive others eyes.
But it only served to confirm the truth of his death.
After this wartime chaos is resolved,
a new captain of Squad Five will be selected
by the Central 46 and Squad leaders.
Squad Seven Captain Komamura Squad Nine Captain Tosen
Would you two please return to command your squads?
I tooshall visit the front lines soon.
Thank you for your efforts, Captain Tosen
Just that Captain Aizen had passed away.
In order to inquire into the truth behind Captain Aizens death,
it seems the quickest route lies in ending this fighting.
Nothing would be better than to avoid fighting,
but it seems things are not going to go so smoothly.
people would not be mislead by ugly emotions
and neither would ugly tragedies occur.
Finally, it is time for Captain Tosens suzumushi” to cry out.
I detest fighting from the bottom of my heart.
Unlike earlier, you can actually hear my bells ringing!
I wear the bells and my eye patch
just so I can get greater enjoyment out of my battles.
Is no reason for me to wear them if you do not take advantage of them.
You take me for a fool?!
And that is why you will not release your Zanpaku-to, either?
My sword can cut you now.
If you let your guard down and -
My Zanpaku-to does not have a name.
My sword is out in the open.
It has never had a sealed form.
This is the true form of my Zanpaku-to.
Well, that is a relief to hear.
So that means your sword will not get any more powerful than it is now.
Ill be able to win soon.”
You Are the one taking me for a fool.
The reason I do not seal my Zanpaku-to is that
my Spiritual Pressure is so huge that I cannot seal it,
even if I use all my might.
So, when I fight, I make it a habit to hold back when I swing my sword.
If I did not do that, my enemies are so weak that
I would not have enough time to enjoy the battle!
I told you not to let up, did not I?
Loosening up just because you found a chance or two of victory
And it had been a long time
since I came up against someone who could have killed me,
or could hear my bells during battle.
I do not want to die!
How can I die in a place like this?!
I looked up into the night sky and saw a comet
I want to see you right now, but I cannot fly
If I could become a comet
I would fly across the sky I am sure
I would circle the skies and shine over you
With this instantaneous light that will definitely reach you
If I could become a comet
I am sure I will always stay close to you
This is the strength of our Captain!
I am going to turn things around now!
I am looking forward to it, too.
